item.title: The Attacker's Mindset
item.description: Whenever I was studying topics related to Identity & Access Management (IAM), every resource I found was always very theoretical.

item.title: Conquering Salesforce IAM - First Steps
item.description: Read the introduction to a long-running series on Identity & Access Management for Salesforce. We’ll take a journey together by taking small, sizeable steps into the world of Salesforce IAM.

item.title: Creating a new website using Hugo
item.description: As someone who’s passionate about technology, I love to pick up a new technology every now and then. Discover the world of Hugo, a static site generator built with the Go language.

item.title: Guest on the Talent Hub Talk Podcast
item.description: Recently I was a guest on the Talent Hub Talk Podcast with host Ben Duncombe. Check out the episode to learn more on my journey to CTA & standing out in your consulting career.

item.title: This is my story
item.description: Welcome to my personal website and blog. This is a first post explaining what you can expect here in the future.

item.title: About
item.description: Nicolas is making his first website in Hugo and is having fun while doing so.
